content.rendered: Trinity’s President, Cory Minter, wrote a book for individuals having trouble with the job seeking process called “Handbook to Getting Hired in Today’s Recession“.  This book was written to help individuals seeking employment, as well as support our favorite charity.  100% of the proceeds of this book will go to support the Oklahoma Baptist Children’s Home.  By purchasing this book, you will directly support children in the Tulsa Area. Learn the proven system that the Founder of Bridge Careers Travel Agencies has used to help hundreds of people like you find great jobs. Don’t start the job hunt process alone and unprepared. •  Unable to find a job in this challenging economy? •  Stressed about being jobless? •  Unable to find a job that actually pays you what you are worth? •  Have you been told you are “over-qualified”? •  Are you financially struggling? In this POWERFUL HANDBOOK you will learn everything you need to know about finding a great job now, including: •  Filling out Applications •  Writing an Effective Resume •  Cover Letters •  Interviewing •  Follow-Up Letters It can be hard to crack the human resources hiring code. HANDBOOK TO GETTING HIRED puts the process into simple and understandable terms.
